mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BI(BI_RQCODE , BI_MMHELPER, BI_PRICE , BI_SYSDATE) VALUES(#{biRqCode},#{biMmHelper},#{biPrice},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT RQ_CODE AS rqCode FROM RQ WHERE RQ_CODE = #{rqCode}
SELECT AL_MMID AS alMmid FROM AL WHERE AL_MMID = #{alMmid} AND AL_STCODE ='1'
SELECT BI_PRICE AS biPrice , BI_MMHELPER AS biMmHelperView FROM BI WHERE BI_MMHELPER =#{biMmHelperView} ORDER BY BI_PRICE ASC
SELECT COUNT (*) BI_MMHELPER FROM BI WHERE BI_MMHELPER= #{biMmHelper}
